p: Natural products with some degree of biological benefits are regarded as bioactive compounds. Phytochemicals include a broad spectrum of plant bioactive compounds which are majorly proven to be safe. In recent times, these phytochemicals obtained from herbs have gained prominence in ethnomedicine as attractive choices for antiviral therapies ( Utomo et al., 2020). Some polyphenols, a subset of phytochemicals, have been suggested to inhibit the fusion and entry of SARS-CoV-2 ( Paraiso et al., 2020). So far, reports indicate that most African countries bear lesser COVID-19 burden compared to some Northern and Western nations of the globe ( Figure 1). To explain this, several reasons have been proposed, including demography, climate, genetic variations, cross immunity, and antimalarial usage ( Lalaoui et al., 2020).
